column2:
"Something like this should be a cinch for
someone like you. I mean, you've got so
much experience now."

"But they say the automata are carrying around
the silver pebbles you're looking for, so this is
where your fighting skills will come into play."

"That's why you're perfect for this!
Alright, I'm counting on you!"

"それなりに経験をつんできたアンタなら
このぐらいカンタンでしょ？
さくさくっと集めてきてよね！"

"地下坑道にいる機甲種が
持ち歩いてるって話だから
実力がものをいう依頼よ？"

"そういう意味で、アンタにうってつけ！
それじゃ、よろしくね！"
